title: How to scan from my HP printer with Windows 10 - Quora

response.answer_text: You cannot unless your printer includes a scanner. There are “All-in-One" printers which are able to make prints, copy documents and scan flat art. Those printers come with the necessary software and drivers. Since you neglected to tell us which model HP printer you own, a specific answer to your question is not possible.

[Cable Option] You don’t need to install driver, just open Windows default Scan app [or download on Microsoft Store] and scan [Wireless Option] Look for the specific steps according to your printer, usually there are pre-assigned IP on your printer (If connected to your WiFi)
